MS has no idea and can't do a single thing provided you..

A- Have the newest firmware.
B- Have every game with verified stealth.
C- MOST IMPORANT! Do..not..play..until..release date.

If you follow those simple rules, MS can do absolutely nothing to you.  They have no grounds to ban you. The reason you play so many games could very well be because you're rich, work at a game store and rent them or borrow them from a bunch of friends that have a few games each.  No worries, guys.
